fn.p: AJ, PB and RG conceived the YEFE study and DK, GW and PB conceived the NIFTY study. AJ, DK, GW, PB and RG designed the studies. AJ, DK and GW are coordinating and leading the execution of the trials at both sites. DK and AJ prepared the first draft of the manuscript. GW, PB and RG contributed to the preparation of the manuscript. All authors were involved in the revision of the draft manuscript and have agreed to the final content.
